bomberman.core.logic
Class DynamicPhysicsEntity

java.lang.Object
  bomberman.core.logic.Entity
      bomberman.core.logic.DynamicPhysicsEntity
All Implemented Interfaces:
PhysicsEntity
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, Bomber, Enemy, FireEntity, PowerUp
public abstract class DynamicPhysicsEntity
extends Entity
implements PhysicsEntity

The subclass of Entity that handles interactions with the Box2d physics engine and updates the state of the entity as time passes.

See Also:
LogicWorld

Field Detail

logicWorld

private LogicWorld logicWorld
The LogicWorld

body

private Body body
The physics body associated with the entity that is used the physics simulating for calculating motion and collisions.

box2dScale

private float box2dScale
The box2d scale factor.

height

private float height
The Body height.

isSensor

private boolean isSensor
The Box2d parameter that indicates if the Body associated to this DynamicPhysicsEntity should interact and be affected by colliding with other entities and static bodies. If true, although the body's physics is not affected by the world, the relative PhysicsEntity.ContactListener is still listening for Contacts.

See Also:
http://www.box2d.org/manual.html#_Toc258082972

speed

private float speed
The Body speed.

width

private float width
The Body width.

Constructor Detail

DynamicPhysicsEntity

public DynamicPhysicsEntity(LogicWorld logicWorld,
                            float x,
                            float y,
                            int lives,
                            float speed,
                            boolean isSensor)
Instantiates a new DynamicPhysicsEntity

Parameters:
logicWorld - the LogicWorld in which the entity acts
x - the x position in pixels
y - the y position in pixels
lives - the entity's lives
speed - the entity's speed
isSensor - The Box2d parameter that indicates if the Body associated to this DynamicPhysicsEntity should interact and be affected by colliding with other entities and static bodies. If true, although the body's physics is not affected by the world, the relative PhysicsEntity.ContactListener is still listening for Contacts.
See Also:
http://www.box2d.org/manual.html#_Toc258082972

DynamicPhysicsEntity

public DynamicPhysicsEntity(LogicWorld logicWorld,
                            Vector2 pos,
                            int lives,
                            float speed,
                            boolean isSensor)
Instantiates a new DynamicPhysicsEntity

Parameters:
logicWorld - the LogicWorld
pos - the position of the entity in pixels, expressed with a Vector2
lives - the entity's lives
speed - the entity's speed
isSensor - The Box2d parameter that indicates if the Body associated to this DynamicPhysicsEntity should interact and be affected by colliding with other entities and static bodies. If true, although the body's physics is not affected by the world, the relative PhysicsEntity.ContactListener is still listening for Contacts.
See Also:
http://www.box2d.org/manual.html#_Toc258082972
Method Detail

alignPosition

public void alignPosition(Block c)
Align the position of the entity with the relative Block in grid. Useful in managing entities that moves independently using a MoveStrategy, prevents unwanted collisions and bad movements.

Parameters:
c - the Block to which align to
